name: Demon Slayer
Start point: The gypsy in her tent at Varrock square.
Description: Wizards of the dark arts have freed the ancient demon Delrith. Find out how to imprison him again before its too late and he destroys Varrock.

substeps: Talk to the Gypsy in her tent in Varrock square.
Pay her 1 coin.
Ask her about the magical incantation needed to defeat Delrith.
Go to Varrock Castle.
Talk to Sir Prysin in the south-west room.
Ask him about Silverlight.
Go upstairs in Varrock Castle.
Talk to Captain Rovin.
Ask him for his key until he gives it to you.
Go to the most north-east room on the ground floor[UK]1st floor[US] of Varrock Castle.
Go upstairs.
Take the Bucket from the room.
Go back downstairs.
Use the Bucket with the sink to get a Bucket of water.
Go to the room where Sir Prysin is.
Use the Bucket of water on the drain.
Go outside the castle to the Manhole just north-east of the western entrance.
Enter the Varrock Sewers.
Walk east and pick up the Rusty key from the floor.
Ensure you have 25 bones.
Travel south to the Wizards' Tower.
Talk to Wizard Traiborn on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US].
Give him the 25 bones to receive the third key.
Return to Sir Prysin in Varrock Castle with all three keys.
He will give you the Silverlight sword.
Wield the Silverlight sword.
Go south of Varrock, past the east gate, to the Dark Wizards' stone circle.
Attack Delrith.
Fight him until his health bar is empty.
A cutscene will play showing him weakened.
When prompted, choose the incantation: "Carlem Aber Camerinthum Purchai Gabindo".
Delrith will be banished. Congratulations, quest complete!
